text: Liffré () is a commune. It is in Brittany in the Ille-et-Vilaine department in northwest France. In 2021, 8,507 people lived there. == Twin towns == Liffré is twinned with: * Wendover, England, United Kingdom * Piéla, Burkina Faso * Beniel, Spain Category:Communes in Ille-et-Vilaine
title: Liffré
